Huang Jia Liang

Korean: 후앙지아량

Country:

China

Full name:
Huang Jia Liang

Birthday:

Age:
20 years old

Introduction

Huang Jia Liang is a Chinese trainee under Qin's Entertainment. He is a member of the trainee group BC221. He gained recognition as a contestant on the survival show Starlight Boys.
